Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2511 affecting package openssl for versions less than 3.3.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2511 affecting package openssl for versions less than 3.3.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 3.3.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-2511
